hero.title: Cut Your Electricity Bills. Power Your Future.
hero.subtitle: Join 500+ Jharkhand families saving lakhs with dependable rooftop and hybrid solar solutions designed around you.
hero.primaryAlt: Dakshayani engineers installing a rooftop solar plant

installs.title: 8 kW Duplex Rooftop
installs.summary: Sun-tracking friendly design for an east-west duplex with surge protection and earthing upgrades.

installs.title: 35 kW Manufacturing Retrofit
installs.summary: Retrofit on light-gauge roofing with optimisers to balance shading across production bays.

installs.title: Solar Irrigation Pump Cluster
installs.summary: High-efficiency AC pump with remote diagnostics energising micro-irrigation for farmers.
